content.question: Which of the following was a major demographic change in Western Europe between 1850 and 1914?

choices.label: A dramatic shift of population to urban areas
A pronounced trend toward larger families

content.answer: A dramatic shift of population to urban areas

topic.text: 6.10: Causation in the Age of Industrialization

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
